name: Mulaka
description: Dive into northern Mexico's breathtaking landscapes with Mulaka, a 3D action-adventure game based on the rich indigenous culture of the Tarahumara.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Iris Pro Graphics 6200 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
